mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE hierarchy AS ( -- 루트 노드 선택 SELECT id, parent_id, title, priority, 0 as level FROM ciams_status WHERE parent_id IS NULL UNION ALL -- 자식 노드 재귀 선택 SELECT c.id, c.parent_id, c.title, c.priority, h.level + 1 FROM ciams_status c INNER JOIN hierarchy h ON c.parent_id = h.id ) SELECT id, parent_id, title, priority FROM hierarchy ORDER BY level, priority

SELECT csg.id AS status_group_id, csg.status_id, csg.title, csg.chart_axis, csg.view, csg.priority, csdg.data_id FROM ciams_status_group csg INNER JOIN ciams_status_data_group csdg ON csg.id = csdg.status_group_id WHERE csg.status_id = #{statusId} ORDER BY csg.priority

SELECT CASE WHEN csdc.use_code = true THEN LOWER(csdc.label) ELSE LOWER(csdc.name) END AS name, CASE WHEN csdc.use_code = true THEN get_cd_nm(csdc.label, '') ELSE LOWER(csdc.label) END AS label, csdc.use_code, csdc.use_axis, csdc.data_type, csdc.unit, csdc.series_type FROM ciams_status_data_column_group csdcg INNER JOIN ciams_status_data_column csdc ON csdcg.column_id = csdc.id WHERE csdcg.data_id = #{dataId} AND csdc.use_yn = true ORDER BY csdcg.priority
SELECT r_column, c_column, v_column FROM ciams_status_pivot WHERE data_id = #{dataId}

SELECT * FROM (VALUES ('A0', '구분', false, 'STRING')) AS static_row(name, label, use_axis, data_type) UNION ALL SELECT 'A' || ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${cColumn}) AS name, ${cColumn} AS label, true AS use_axis, #{dataType} AS data_type FROM ${tableName} GROUP BY ${cColumn}

SELECT -- csdc.label AS "A0", CASE WHEN csdc.use_code = true THEN get_cd_nm(csdc.label, '') ELSE csdc.label END AS "A0",
MAX(CASE WHEN DT.${pivot.cColumn} = #{col} THEN ${pivot.vColumn} END) AS "A${idx + 1}"
FROM ciams_status_data_column_group csdcg INNER JOIN ciams_status_data_column csdc ON csdcg.column_id = csdc.id INNER JOIN ${dataName} AS DT ON DT.${pivot.rColumn} = csdc.label WHERE csdcg.data_id = #{dataId} AND csdc.use_yn = true GROUP BY csdcg.priority, csdc.use_code, csdc.label ORDER BY csdcg.priority
